title: Magic Face C3-City
summary: Interactive face with 3D Architecture style and customized color combinations!
description: This digital interactive watch face is one of the winners in the Watch Face Design Competition, which is held by Magic Watchface and Tencent. http://www.ui.cn/detail/55866.htmlFeatures:-Every number, letter and architecture is designed separately-6 preset themes with different color combinations-Tap the watch to change between themes, texts show up in a very animated way-Customizable colors for text, background architecture and surroundings-Support both round and square Android Wear smart watches.City, this is a place you are living in.City, Concrete jungle where dreams are made ofThere's nothing you can't doMore facesIf you like this interactive Face C3-City, share it with your friends.Feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformYou can also search magic face  to find more of our works.Supported Devices:C3-City supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.About us:We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Website:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
descriptionHTML:
This digital interactive watch face is one of the winners in the Watch Face Design Competition, which is held by Magic Watchface and Tencent. http://www.ui.cn/detail/55866.html

Features:
-Every number, letter and architecture is designed separately
-6 preset themes with different color combinations
-Tap the watch to change between themes, texts show up in a very animated way
-Customizable colors for text, background architecture and surroundings
-Support both round and square Android Wear smart watches.

City, this is a place you are living in.
City, Concrete jungle where dreams are made of
There's nothing you can't do

More faces
If you like this interactive Face C3-City, share it with your friends.
Feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

Supported Devices:
C3-City supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

About us:
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

comments: I really like the design of this face, the only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because although it lets you customize it, your settings can not be saved. Additionally I wish there was an option to lock the screen to one color scheme instead of having to cycle through all the presets to get back to the one you want every time you happen to touch the screen.
Love it! But... Love it, it's brilliant! But... 12 hour mode?? Tencent based? You in Shenzhen?
